mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IMAGE_ANALYSIS (IMAGE_ANALYSIS_SQ, ANGER, CONTEMPT, FEAR, DISGUST, HAPPINESS, NEUTRAL, SADNESS, SURPRISED, FACE_TOP, FACE_LEFT, FACE_WIDTH, FACE_HEIGHT, ANS_SQ) VALUES (IMAGE_ANALYSIS_SQ.NEXTVAL, TO_NUMBER(#{anger}), TO_NUMBER(#{contempt}), TO_NUMBER(#{fear}), TO_NUMBER(#{disgust}), TO_NUMBER(#{happiness}), TO_NUMBER(#{neutral}), TO_NUMBER(#{sadness}), TO_NUMBER(#{surprise}), TO_NUMBER(#{faceTop}), TO_NUMBER(#{faceLeft}), TO_NUMBER(#{faceWidth}), TO_NUMBER(#{faceHeight}), TO_NUMBER(#{ansSq}) )
mapper.select: SELECT ROUND(SUM(ANGER)/COUNT(*),2) ANGER, ROUND(SUM(CONTEMPT)/COUNT(*),2) CONTEMPT, ROUND(SUM(FEAR)/COUNT(*),2) FEAR, ROUND(SUM(DISGUST)/COUNT(*),2) DISGUST, ROUND(SUM(HAPPINESS)/COUNT(*),2) HAPPINESS, ROUND(SUM(NEUTRAL)/COUNT(*),2) NEUTRAL, ROUND(SUM(SADNESS)/COUNT(*),2) SADNESS, ROUND(SUM(SURPRISE)/COUNT(*),2) SURPRISE, MIN(FACE_TOP) FACE_TOP, MAX(FACE_LEFT) FACE_LEFT, MAX(FACE_WIDTH) FACE_WIDTH, MAX(FACE_HEIGHT) FACE_HEIGHT, COUNT(*) totalCnt FROM IMAGE_ANALYSIS WHERE ANS_SQ = #{ansSq}
